title: Ke Jin Wanjia
synopsis:
In the future world, the virtual game "Epoch" developed by Chu Group has attracted worldwide attention for its perfect immersive experience. However, on the eve of the game's official launch, the game developers Chu and his wife disappeared mysteriously. In order to find clues about the whereabouts of his parents, the rich young man Chu Yi, under the guidance of the humanoid AI Chaos, spent 30 billion krypton gold to enter the game upgrade adventure. In the process, Chu Yi gathered a group of player partners who fought side by side. After several efforts, he finally found out that his parents' disappearance was related to the Fantasy World Organization. 

In order to find the whereabouts of his parents, fight against the Fantasy World Organization, and "save" the Era World, Chu Yi launched a series of ridiculous and unimaginable krypton gold operations, embarked on a journey of playing the pig and eating the tiger, and a wonderful battle between good and evil began.

(Source: Youku, Google translated)
